channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.description:

item.title: Report X-2024072472
item.description:
Report X-2024072472

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-02T18:16:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-25
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO TRAILER 125 TO CLEAN UP LEAKING HAZMAT BOX. RESPONDER ARRIVED WEARING ALL PPE AND USED DECISION TREE TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER BROUGHT BOX BACK TO DMP FOR PROCESSING.
